snippet: The Hall of Fame trainer D. Wayne Lukas, who will saddle Optimizer in Saturday's Belmont Stakes, was taken to Winthrop University Hospital in Mineola, N.Y., on Tuesday afternoon after one of his horses reared up and struck him in his head.
abstract: The Hall of Fame trainer D. Wayne Lukas, who will saddle Optimizer in Saturday's Belmont Stakes, was taken to Winthrop University Hospital in Mineola, N.Y., on Tuesday afternoon after one of his horses reared up and struck him in his head.

headline.main: Lukas Receives Stitches After Being Struck by Horse
